text: R. S. Pandey is a politician and a former Indian Administrative Service officer (batch of 1972 and retired in 2010). He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) from December 2013 - October 2019, and a special invitee member of the BJP National Executive since March 2015. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Politicians from Bihar Category:Government of Nagaland Category:Indian civil servants Category:Bihar MLAs 2015â€“2020
title: Raghaw Sharan Pandey
